Britain to send 200 air defence missiles to UkraineBritain is sending around 200 air defence missiles to Ukraine to help protect civilians and infrastructure from Russian drones and bombing, the British ministry of defence said on Friday. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 16:16:55 GMT BL7NRNDPHNMAXEYXUGDPPYOXOU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/britain-send-200-air-defence-missiles-ukraine-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Zelenskiy visits Ukraine's embattled eastern town of AvdiivkaPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Friday he visited eastern Ukraine's embattled town of Avdiivka, which Russian forces are trying to encircle in some of the most ferocious fighting at the front. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 16:12:31 GMT SF5ZK2B2AJMTHFDO5WVYJKJZPI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-says-he-visited-embattled-eastern-town-avdiivka-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Brazil shows concern as Venezuela slams UK warship sent to GuyanaBrazil expressed concern on Friday after Venezuela complained about the deployment of a British warship off the Guyana coast, raising tensions in a border dispute over the oil-rich Esequibo region of the former British colony. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 16:09:09 GMT DYQY3ITO7NI27HTMW5NOKZRQTA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-shows-concern-venezuela-slams-uk-warship-sent-guyana-2023-12-29/Reuters世界美洲
Denmark to send frigate to U.S.-led task force in Red SeaDenmark will send a frigate to participate in the U.S.-led Red Sea operation next month, the Danish Defence Minister said on Friday. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 16:06:56 GMT H4LS23EXVNIBDBHNTT5A6PXEY4 https://www.reuters.com/world/denmark-send-frigate-us-led-task-force-red-sea-2023-12-29/Reuters世界
Spain signals continuity with appointment of Cuerpo as economy ministerSpanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez on Friday appointed Carlos Cuerpo, a close ally of the outgoing Nadia Calvino, as new economy and trade minister. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 14:17:09 GMT ISRQK6WCYNPHPIOIN2UCWYP7AM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spain-signals-continuity-with-appointment-cuerpo-economy-minister-2023-12-29/Belén Carreño, David Latona世界欧洲
Baby saved from Gaza rubble after mother killed in Israeli strikeThe rescuers in orange vests shouted as they reached a baby girl still alive in the rubble of an Israeli air strike on the Gaza Strip's Rafah city after yet another night of bombardment of the Palestinian enclave. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 13:59:26 GMT HSWVKNMZ2ROIPJWEIULASGRTGI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/baby-saved-gaza-rubble-after-mother-killed-israeli-strike-2023-12-29/Arafat Barbakh世界中东
Xi urges Chinese envoys to create 'diplomatic iron army'Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday urged Chinese ambassadors to forge a "diplomatic iron army" loyal to the Communist Party, reviving the abrasive "Wolf Warrior" rhetoric propagated by some diplomats as a sign of China's increasingly assertive foreign policy. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 13:30:03 GMT E6PBM2IYCZLTDECY6EBTCI6HTY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/xi-urges-chinese-envoys-create-diplomatic-iron-army-2023-12-29/Laurie Chen世界中国
Putin's spy chief vows to prevent foreign meddling in presidential electionPresident Vladimir Putin's foreign intelligence chief said in a video released on Friday that Russia's spies should make every effort to prevent any foreign meddling in the March presidential election. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 13:04:12 GMT VRCCK3NB4RPKVBRQ3XX5LMMAPY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putins-spy-chief-vows-prevent-foreign-meddling-presidential-election-2023-12-29/Reuters世界欧洲
Conservative Cardinal Burke says he is 'still alive' after rare pope meetingConservative American Cardinal Raymond Burke, one of Pope Francis' fiercest critics, had his first private audience with the pontiff in seven years on Friday, a month after the pope said he was stripping him of some of his Vatican privileges. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 12:31:21 GMT SZM3UGDU45MJHLFY5SPG2N7BAM https://www.reuters.com/world/conservative-cardinal-burke-says-he-is-still-alive-after-rare-pope-meeting-2023-12-29/Philip Pullella世界
In Gaza, rows of white shrouds symbolise mounting civilian deaths"My life, my eyes, my soul," a husband writes on the white shroud wrapped around his wife after the war devastating Gaza took her life. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 11:26:18 GMT MQMB5RZIKZK4RIVC2VPOHJWPWE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-rows-white-shrouds-symbolise-mounting-civilian-deaths-2023-12-29/ Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Fadi Shana, Ibraheemabu Mustafa, Saleh Salem世界中东
In Nigeria and much of Africa, Catholic same-sex couples see no blessings soonNigerian Catholic couple Jane and Lucy have little hope their local parish church will bless their same-sex union anytime soon, as conservative priests across Africa choose to ignore a landmark Vatican ruling allowing such blessings. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 11:02:01 GMT YJIKWOG2G5IMBCFYH4ODU2RFCA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/nigeria-much-africa-catholic-same-sex- Couples-see-no-blessings-soon-2023-12-29/Abraham Achirga世界非洲
